document_data.mainbody:
he Orbrum was a book on magic known in the 8 century DR.
In the , the sorceress Dasumia commanded her apprentice Elminster Aumar to fetch the Orbrum from her side table in a well-warded room, the Blue Chamber, in her own Castle of the Lady, along with the other books Prospaer on Nameless Horrors and the Tome of Three Locks.
